    • limitedRand

      public static int limitedRand(int[] thresholds, int min, int numElem)
      Performs a random selection between categories with a limited number of resources.
      Parameters:
      thresholds - resources limits.
      min - interval lower-bound.
      numElem - the number of elements.
      Returns:
      random seed.
